content.tagline: Prepared for your team — concise briefing

slides.notes: Quickly introduce the deck and objectives.

slides.title: AI in Cross-Country E-commerce
slides.subtitle: Scaling Global Operations with Machine Intelligence
slides.notes: Open with the scale of cross-border commerce and why AI orchestration matters for every region at once.

slides.title: The Global E-commerce Matrix
slides.subtitle: Key Challenges AI Solves

bullets.label: Localization Lag
bullets.description: Language barriers and culturally relevant messaging slow down launches.

bullets.label: Dynamic Pricing
bullets.description: Currency swings and local competitors demand constant repricing.

bullets.label: Logistics Complexity
bullets.description: Demand forecasting and cross-border shipping windows remain volatile.

bullets.label: Customer Experience
bullets.description: 24/7 support and personalization across every time zone.

slides.notes: Make this slide interactive by asking which of these challenges is most painful for the audience today.

slides.title: AI Orchestration Ecosystem
slides.subtitle: How intelligence connects every global function

spokes.label: Marketing
spokes.description: Localized campaigns and A/B testing automation

slides.notes: Show how AI orchestrates all key business functions from a single, learning center.

slides.title: AI Challenge 1: The Language Barrier

bullets.label: Product Descriptions
bullets.description: Localized tone and compliance checks before content goes live.

bullets.label: SEO
bullets.description: AI generates long-tail keywords per locale for faster organic growth.

bullets.label: User Reviews
bullets.description: Summaries keep merchandising teams aware of sentiment in any language.

metrics.label: Drop in localization errors after rollout

slides.notes: Share a customer story that highlights how translation quality drove conversion.

slides.title: AI Challenge 2: Dynamic Pricing & Demand

metrics.label: Average revenue lift from AI pricing

bullets.label: Competitor Monitoring
bullets.description: Regional price changes trigger intelligent counter moves.

bullets.label: Forecasting
bullets.description: Models anticipate demand spikes around holidays, weather, and news.

bullets.label: Custom Duties
bullets.description: Tariffs auto-roll into the final price shown to shoppers.

slides.notes: Call out integrations with pricing or ERP systems the audience already uses.

slides.title: Regional Expansion Playbook
slides.subtitle: Focus areas for the next three markets

columns.title: Market Readiness
items: Validate demand signals with pilot data

items.label: Messaging

columns.title: Operational Scaling
items: Instrument KPIs and alerting for each region

slides.title: AI Capability Performance

slides.title: AI Maturity Model
slides.subtitle: Path to global AI excellence

levels.title: Level 1 — Automation
levels.description: Task-level efficiency using rules and scripts.

levels.title: Level 2 — Intelligence
levels.description: Predictive analytics embedded into regional workflows.

levels.title: Level 3 — Orchestration
levels.description: Coordinated, adaptive AI across all markets and functions.

slides.notes: Explain how clients move from local pilots to enterprise-wide orchestration.

slides.title: Intelligent Rollout Lifecycle
slides.subtitle: End-to-end flow of AI enablement

steps.title: Assess
steps.description: Identify regional readiness and AI gaps

steps.title: Configure
steps.description: Tune language, pricing, and logistics models

steps.title: Deploy
steps.description: Launch pilot markets with control dashboards

steps.title: Measure
steps.description: Track KPIs and retrain models continuously

slides.notes: Use this to emphasize continuous improvement and measurable ROI.

slides.title: 90-Day Intelligent Rollout
slides.subtitle: Structured phases to launch and learn

phases.title: Configure & Train
activities: Enable success teams with guided flows

phases.title: Launch & Optimize

slides.title: AI in Health Care
slides.subtitle: Better life with AI

content.tagline: Transforming patient care through intelligent technology

slides.notes: Opening slide to set the tone for AI transformation in healthcare

slides.title: What is AI in Healthcare?
slides.subtitle: Understanding the Technology

bullets.label: Machine Learning Systems
bullets.description: Algorithms that learn from medical data to identify patterns and make predictions

bullets.label: Natural Language Processing
bullets.description: Understanding and analyzing clinical documentation and patient communications

bullets.label: Computer Vision
bullets.description: Interpreting medical images like X-rays, MRIs, and CT scans with precision

bullets.label: Predictive Analytics
bullets.description: Forecasting disease progression and treatment outcomes based on data

slides.notes: Establish foundational understanding of AI technologies in medical context

slides.title: Why AI Matters Now
slides.subtitle: Addressing Critical Healthcare Challenges

bullets.label: Physician Burnout
bullets.description: Growing administrative burden affecting care quality

bullets.label: Diagnostic Errors
bullets.description: Millions affected by misdiagnosis annually

bullets.label: Rising Costs
bullets.description: Healthcare spending outpacing inflation

bullets.label: Workflow Automation
bullets.description: Reducing administrative tasks by up to 40%

bullets.label: Enhanced Accuracy
bullets.description: Improving diagnostic precision significantly

bullets.label: Cost Reduction
bullets.description: Potential to save billions in operational costs

slides.notes: Highlight the urgency and value proposition of AI adoption
